arts.ttl: ‘Well and training’ – Napoli player now in fray to feature against Manchester City after injury scare
arts.sum: This week, there have been major doubts about whether Napoli goalkeeper Alex Meret will be fit enough to feature against Manchester City in their Champions League game at the Etihad Stadium on Thursday. The 28-year-old pulled out of Napoli’s weekend clash against Fiorentina, leaving summer signing Vanja Milinković-Savić to make his debut.
